title: Ranked Rewards
body: Just a general question but even though I have received a ban recently (thus losing free rewards), can I still earn them back in the two-ish weeks I have left to try? I was told on another post that I could if I got Honor 2 but the commenter was not sure so some solid clarification would be awesome. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Getting a 14 day suspension disqualifies you from the normal ranked rewards like the Victorious Skin and borders. If you are able to make it back up to Honor Rank 3 before the end of season, I do believe you'll still get the Honor Ward.
